MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.37pm. Our engineers are on their way to Redding house to investigate a potential blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:50PM on Thursday 14 January 2021.
